pages.text: $(2)$(l)[Toxicity]$() is a status effect gained by drinking a $(l:potion_category)Witcher's potion$(). Each potion will add a varying amount of toxicity, which will be added to the resource bar on your HUD. $(2)$(l)[Toxicity]$() increments in % values, up to a maximum of 100%:$(li)$(l)0%$(): No Effects.$(li)$(l)1%-60%$(): Small Attack Boost.$(li)$(l)60%+$(): Moderate Attack Boost, Nausea, Slowness.$(li)$(l)85%+$(): High Attack Boost, Take Damage over Time.$(li)$(l)100%$(): Overdose and die, instantly.

pages.title: Toxicity Sources
pages.text: $(2)$(l)[Toxicity]$() is increased by the following sources:$(li)$(l:potions/swallow)[Swallow]$(): +25%$(li)$(l:potions/cat)[Cat]$(): +20%$(li)$(l:potions/blizzard)[Blizzard]$(): +25%$(li)$(l:potions/thunderbolt)[Thunderbolt]$(): +25%$(li)$(l:potions/black_blood)[Black Blood]$(): +20%$(li)$(l:potions/maribor_forest)[Maribor Forest]$(): +20%$(li)$(l:potions/full_moon)[Full Moon]$(): +30%

pages.title: Reducing Toxicity
pages.text: $(2)$(l)[Toxicity]$() will decay over time, or can be fully cleared using a [Milk Bucket]. Note that this will also remove all potion effects attributed to the Witcher.
